scripts.say: Thanks to the hard work of everyone from the Research Department, we've managed to make two new breakthroughs, nya!
First, you can now acquire a new set of Priority ship comrades through the Tech Academy, nya!
And second, you can now preview a Priority ship's barrage and skills even if you haven't finished developing them yet, nya!
However, their stats will differ from their fully developed equivalents, nya... Think of it as the Research Department adjusting things a little, nya!
Also, the unlock requirements for these new Priority ships will be a little different from the previous ones, nya! If you don't meet the requirements, go take a look at your Fleet Technology, nya!
